text: to pratyek ko hamane pakad liya usake paap ke kaaran, to inamen se kuchh par patthar barasaaye[1] aur unamen se kuchh ko pakada[2] kadee dhvani ne tatha kuchh ko dhansa diya dharatee mein[3] aur kuchh ko dubo[4] diya tatha nahin tha allaah ki unapar atyaachaar karata, parantu ve svayan apane oopar atyaachaar kar rahe the
